name: needlepoint
content:

Add to word list
[ U ] the activity of making patterns or pictures that consist of stitches sewn very close together directly onto cloth: Sarah does needlepoint while her 2-year-old watches TV.
Rosmarie Wirz/Moment/GettyImages
[ C or U ] a pattern of stitches sewn very close together directly onto cloth, or an object made or decorated like this: I sat working on my needlepoint. a needlepoint cushion Compare
embroidery (SEWING)
